title: The Amazon awakens
creator_credit: Walt Disney Productions and Inter-American Affairs
brief_description: The story of the Amazon River Basin; its history and exploration by early Spanish explorers; its industrial progress; the natural resources and vast riches of this region still awaiting discovery and exploitation.
